resource_dependency.attraction_campsite_data_schema: Database tables: attractions(id, name, description, country, city, latitude, longitude, image_urls[], category), campsites(id, name, description, country, city, latitude, longitude, image_urls[], price_per_night, amenities[]), availability(attraction_id/campsite_id, date, status)

function: Establish a backend connection to a PostgreSQL database using predefined environment variables and define the schema for storing attractions and campsites data.
static_description: The backend service connects to the PostgreSQL instance using the provided environment variable configuration. It initializes the attractions and campsites tables along with related metadata.

function: Configure package.json scripts to enable concurrent development startup of both frontend and backend services.
static_description: The repository's package.json includes a script named 'dev' which uses the concurrently package to start both frontend and backend processes simultaneously.

function: Define package.json command that installs dependencies for both frontend and backend directories.
static_description: The repository's package.json defines an 'install:all' script that executes npm install commands in both frontend and backend subdirectories.

function: Render a homepage showcasing featured tourist attractions and campsites across Europe with consistent styling.
static_description: Homepage displays a hero banner [hero_image_placeholder], site logo [logo_asset_path], navigation bar, and two horizontal scrolling carousels - one for featured attractions and one for featured campsites. Background color set to light pink (#FFB6C1) with interactive controls in medium violet red (#C71585).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on any carousel item navigates to the detailed view page for that attraction or campsite.
Clicking navigation links redirects to corresponding sections or pages.

resource_dependency.city_dropdown_options: [Dynamic list of cities per selected country]

function: Enable users to filter attractions and campsites through multiple criteria including country, city, and keywords.
static_description: Search interface contains dropdown menus for selecting country and dynamically populated city options, a text input field labeled [keyword_input_placeholder], Apply Filters button [filter_button_label], Reset Filters link [reset_filters_label], and results display area. Styled with light pink background and medium violet red controls.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a country populates the city dropdown with relevant cities fetched from API.
Clicking Apply Filters sends request to [search_api_endpoint] with selected parameters and updates results display.
Clicking Reset Filters clears all selections and reloads default results.

function: Display comprehensive information about individual attractions or campsites including media, location, availability, and user-generated content.
static_description: Detailed view page shows title, description, [images_gallery_component], embedded map [map_embed_url], [availability_calendar], [reviews_section], and action buttons [book_now_button] and [write_review_button]. Uses light pink background and medium violet red for interactive elements.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking Book Now opens the booking modal/form.
Clicking Write Review opens the review submission form.

function: Allow authenticated users to make reservations for attractions and campsites with date selection and confirmation workflow.
static_description: Booking interface presents [date_picker_component] for selecting dates, displays pricing information, shows guest count selector, and features a Submit Booking button. Requires active user session.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking available dates in calendar selects/unselects them.
Clicking Submit Booking sends reservation data to [booking_submit_endpoint] and displays [confirmation_modal_template] upon success.

function: Provide a mechanism for authenticated users to rate and provide written feedback on visited attractions and campsites.
static_description: Review submission form consists of [rating_stars_component], textarea labeled [review_textarea_label], and [submit_review_button]. Accessible only to logged-in users. Styled with light pink background and medium violet red controls.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking stars sets rating value visually and internally.
Clicking Submit Review sends data to [review_submit_endpoint] and refreshes reviews section after successful submission.

function: Implement user registration, login, and persistent session handling for access control to protected features.
static_description: Authentication screens include separate Register and Login forms with respective input fields [register_form_fields]/[login_form_fields], action buttons, and links to switch between views. Maintains user sessions via middleware.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting Register form calls [auth_register_endpoint]; successful creation logs user in automatically.
Submitting Login form calls [auth_login_endpoint]; successful validation establishes session and redirects to previous page or dashboard.

function: Present personalized overview of user activities including bookings, reviews, and saved items.
static_description: Dashboard layout organizes three main sections: [bookings_list_component], [reviews_list_component], and [favorites_list_component]. Includes profile summary header and logout option. Styled with light pink background and medium violet red controls.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking Logout triggers call to [logout_action_endpoint] and redirects to homepage.
Clicking items within lists navigates to associated detail pages.

resource_dependency.map_integration_api: Interactive map API supporting markers clustering and custom overlays

function: Visualize geographic distribution of attractions and campsites using an interactive mapping solution.
static_description: Full-screen map interface showing clustered markers representing attractions and campsites across Europe. Features [zoom_controls], optional geolocation toggle, search-by-location input, and legend/key panel. Integrated with backend marker data endpoint.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking cluster expands it into individual markers.
Clicking a marker opens a tooltip with brief info and link to detailed view.
Using zoom controls adjusts map scale level.

function: Enable administrative personnel to perform full lifecycle content management operations for attractions and campsites.
static_description: Protected admin panel presenting [admin_ui_components] for creating, updating, and deleting attraction/campsite entries. Requires administrator privileges enforced by middleware.

interaction_and_states.description: Filling out creation form and submitting posts data to [content_management_endpoints.create].
Editing existing entry populates form with current data and submits changes to [content_management_endpoints.update].
Deleting entry prompts confirmation dialog then calls [content_management_endpoints.delete].

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience and usability across various device sizes and interaction methods.
static_description: All UI components utilize adaptive layouts based on defined breakpoints [responsive_breakpoints]. Employ [adaptive_layout_engine] for flexible element arrangement and [touch_optimized_controls] for enhanced mobile accessibility.

interaction_and_states.description: Layout reflows according to screen size, adjusting grid columns, font sizes, spacing, and hiding/showing elements appropriately.
Interactive elements respond to touch events with appropriate sizing and feedback suitable for fingers rather than mouse pointers.

function: Apply consistent thematic styling throughout the application using specified color palette.
static_description: Entire application utilizes [main_background_style] as primary background tone and applies [interactive_control_style] to all actionable UI elements like buttons, links, form controls, etc. Managed through centralized [design_system_tokens].

interaction_and_states.description: Interactive controls slightly darken or highlight when hovered over, maintaining theme consistency.
Focused interactive elements receive visible outline or shadow matching the theme colors for accessibility.
